mapper.select: select id, category_id, sku_type, sku_name, img_url, per_limit, publish_status, check_status, is_new_person, sort, sku_code, price, market_price, stock, lock_stock, low_stock, sale, ware_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from sku_info, sku_ware where sku_info.id = sku_ware.sku_id and sku_info.id = #{skuId} and stock - lock_stock > #{skuNum} for update
